ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Wallet_Opportunity_Type__c,'Dapp Discovery Browsers'), OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Wallet_Opportunity_Type__c) ), RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Wallet_Opportunity', ISBLANK( DmP_OKR_Cohort__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Required to fill DmP OKR Cohort When Wallet Opportunity Type = 'Dapp Discovery Browsers'
